"Lecturer, Department of Electrical & Computer Engineering (ECE) North South University (NSU) Dhaka, Bangladesh May 2018 – Present • Teaching CS courses such as data structures, computer architecture, software development, software testing as a core faculty of Computer Science since Summer 2018. • Working as the career coordinator for the School of Engineering and Physical Sciences (SEPS) to organize industrial workshops, on-campus recruitments, industry talks and professional grooming sessions for engineering students at NSU.
R&D Software Engineer 2 June 2016 – Feb 2018 Keysight Technologies Santa Rosa, CA, USA • Worked on developing Electronic Design Automation (EDA) software products in C++11/14, QT and python using test-driven development (TDD) methodology following Agile/Scrum principles. • Ported existing features from proprietary legacy AEL code base to modern C++. • Implemented and rolled out new UI features in Advanced Design System (ADS) 2017. • Performed defect tracking and resolution using TFS and Atlassian toolchains.
Graduate Research Assistant May 2015 – May 2016 HCI Lab, Colorado State University Fort Collins, CO, USA • As a research assistant under Dr. Jaime Ruiz, researched on mobile and wearable interaction, and published paper as first authors in MobileHCI’15 and CHI’16 conferences. • Developed video frame annotation tool for gesture classification using C#, and application for recording gesture sensor data using android.
Graduate Teaching Assistant August 2014 – May 2015 Computer Science Department, Colorado State University Fort Collins, CO, USA • Instructed undergrad class for OOP language and Computer Organization. • Prepared and graded assignments & tests, proctored exams and provided student support.
Senior Software Engineer / Software Engineer March 2011 – July 2014 Samsung R&D Institute, Bangladesh Dhaka, Bangladesh • Developed regional customization features for C/ARM based feature phone OS and Android phones. • Troubleshooted platform integration and after-market issues for native multimedia applications. • Worked as a liaison engineer in UAE, India and Korea for project collaboration. • Received best employee of the month award (March 2013) for engineering work."
